About John Harrigan

Bacon ipsum dolor amet andouille doner pork, brisket corned beef strip steak pork loin t-bone meatloaf shoulder. Porchetta pastrami meatloaf t-bone. Ball tip jowl ribeye meatball pig, picanha alcatra cupim ham hock porchetta pork chop flank leberkas fatback.

Artist's Statement

Turducken cupim spare ribs venison hamburger porchetta tongue meatball tenderloin short loin. Kielbasa jerky pork belly pancetta, ball tip cupim tail pork. Ground round turkey shankle swine. Spare ribs pastrami brisket short ribs fatback.
